title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-7.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-7.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

In this Subpart, health care facility shall have the meaning set forth in Public Health Law section 2997-(h)(1). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-7.1

Adopted

New

York State Register November 23, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 47, eff. 11/23/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
